item.title: China’s Trade Surplus Reaches a Record of Nearly $1 Trillion
item.description: China’s vast exports in 2024 exceeded its imports on a scale seldom seen anywhere except during or immediately after the two world wars.

item.title: News Outlets Batten Down the Hatches for Trump’s Return
item.description: Media organizations are taking unusual steps to prepare for what they fear will be a legal and political onslaught from the new administration.
